interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Reusable Qtips 2x - Cotton Swabs for Ears Wax Removal and Pointed Q tips for Makeup Removal in Green LastSwab®
Review Date: 2021/09/25
Store: LastSwab
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.33 x 0.47 x 1.77 inches; 0.53 Ounces'}
Review Text: I like idea of using less single use items. These reusable Q-tips have different ends for different tasks. The tips feel secure on the stick. I tried pulling them off and I couldn't so that's a good safety feature. Due to the material, I can't use these with acetone nail polish remover and that's what I like to use Q-tips for. Also these are not absorbent so that's another downfall. Unfortunately I won't be relying solely on these LastSwab. Disposable Q-tips are still more versatile but at least I can decrease the usage of them in combination with the LastSwab. I wished these swabs came in a carrying case. The product description mentioned a plastic case. I did see ones with a case but that's a different product. I wasn't expecting to receive a case with this set anyway based on the seller's photos.
Review Title: Reusable but it can't do everything a disposable Q-tip can do
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BJÖRN HALL Nurse Headband with Buttons for Face Mask | Elastic Swimsuit Material, Smooth & Stretchy | Ear Saver Headband with Buttons | Perfect for Nurses, Doctors & Medical Students Björn Hall {'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 4.9 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} This is a nice simple headband that's made out of stretchy swimsuit material. It is single layered so you won't get too warm wearing it. The part that goes behind the back of your head is narrower than the part that goes above your forehead. I wished the forehead part was narrower. I found the button placement fine for my mask (but it would be easy to adjust to your liking with some basic sewing skills). I like that the headband is snug but not uncomfortable. It does slide up a little in the back after a while. Something anti slip on the back would be nice to help keep the headband in place. It may be too tight if you have a larger head. The only thing I don't really like is the large logo. If it couldn't be eliminated it should be smaller or the color of the font be darker so it's not as obvious. Personally, I like the black because it blends into my hair for an inconspicuous look. Nice headband material and your ears will thank you. BJÖRN HALL Button Knotted Nurse Headbands for Women with Buttons | Ear Saver Headband with buttons | Headband with Buttons for Face Mask for Nurses & Doctors | Elastic Hair Band with Buttons | Protect Your Ears with this Headband | Floral Blue Björn Hall {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Björn Hall', 'Size': 'One Size', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.29 x 3.11 x 1.61 inches; 1.34 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'KAL-500'} This is a cute twisted knot headband. The button placement is fine for my mask but it could easily be adjusted to your liking with some basic sewing skills. The fabric is soft and stretchy. I would've liked it to be slightly smaller to begin with because it does feel like it will get stretched out too easily with prolonged use. It is a bold pattern but with the mixed colors, it would be easy to coordinate with different scrubs. This definitely helps alleviate discomfort on your ears from wearing facemasks. Cute headband to use with face masks BEPHOLAN Facial Skin Massager For Slimming Firming Reduce Wrinkles and Skin Rejuvenate BEPHOLAN {'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 4.05 x 1.77 inches; 8.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '748966387468'} This is a nice quality rose quartz facial roller. The massaging feature is nice and relaxing. There is a AA battery already installed (I didn't know that until I just happened to turn it on and it started vibrating). I wish the on/off was actually printed or engraved onto the handle. It's just a little gold sticker that could easily fall off if wet or from regular use. To remove/replace the battery you have to turn it to the "on" position and keep turning until the cap comes off. I wish the large roller actually rolled easily. The stone is smooth so it does glide over my skin nicely and with the vibration on, I can't even tell that the stone isn't actually rolling. The smaller stone attachment is nice to use around the eye area and that stone is also smooth. This set comes in a box and also a velour pouch to store it in. Give yourself a relaxing facial massage GOGALLJUG Jade Roller and Gua Sha,100% Natural Jade Facial Body Eyes Neck Massager Tool Reduce Wrinkles Aging GOG ALLJUG {'Material': 'nature stone', 'Brand': 'GOG ALLJUG', 'Is Cordless?': 'Yes', 'Product Grade': 'Home', 'Product Dimensions': '6.69 x 3.15 x 1.38 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '769390652212', 'Manufacturer': 'TOPTIP'} This is a nice jade facial roller and Gua Sha. Both ends roll smoothly and the Gua Sha is smooth all around. I do wish the stone itself in both pieces felt even smoother, I can feel slight texture in the stones in some spots (it's just not as smooth as a rose quartz roller and Gua Sha that I have but maybe that's just the nature of the stone itself). Otherwise the stone does feel nice on my face especially when it's taken out of the fridge so it feels cool and refreshing. Give yourself a relaxing facial massage with this jade set 4 Pcs Portable Silicone Travel Bottles Keychain Set 1.3oz Empty Hand Sanitizer Bottles Container Leakproof Squeeze Bottles with Flip Cap - Refillable Containers for Toiletries, Shampoo, Liquid ect XITENBAO {'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 7.01 x 1.85 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'hk-099', 'UPC': '650245716459'} This is a nice set of 4 silicone travel bottles. They are soft and flexible. I am using them for hand sanitizer but you could use it for anything (like shampoo, body wash, hand soap, etc). So far there has not been any leaks but I wished there was an additional silicone anti-leak flap where the product comes out (like on certain ketchup or honey bottles) so the more liquidy contents doesn't flow right out when you open the cap. I usually turn the bottle cap side up for a few seconds so the contents are away from the cap before I open and then I turn it upside down to squeeze out. I like the retractable clip (it's essentially an identification badge clip or a keychain). Included are small carabiner clips which will allow you to hook the bottle to the retractable clip. It does look a little bulky with that setup but it works. At least you can use all 3 pieces separately if needed and it wasn't made for just one purpose. The bottles and retractable clips are individually packaged and then those items plus the carabiner clips are all packaged into a zip lock bag. Multi use silicone bottles with multi purpose accessories Reusable Ear Swab and Last Swab Washable Silicone Swabs Double Tipped Silicone Cotton Buds with Portable Makeup Mirror - Green JAOYU {'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 0.39 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '739232135937'} I like the concept of these reusable silicone Q-tips, I didn't know it existed until I stumbled across this set. My set came with everything that's pictured in the description. The whole case is silicone but I wish it had a normal hinge so that it can stay open but it's just a thin piece of silicone. Yes, there is a kick stand that you can pull out to keep the mirror/lid open at an angle. I don't plan on using this like a makeup compact so that doesn't really bother me. The variety of tips that come with this set is nice and you get extra tips. It does take a little bit of effort to pull the tip off (which is a good thing). I'm not sure what the tweezers are for, maybe it's to pull the tips off the stick but I found it was just easier to pull it off with my fingers. The brush that comes in this set seems a bit large for cleaning parts that are tiny. A smaller brush with shorter and more rigid bristles would've been better. They are easy
enough to clean with soap and water. Just be sure to dry everything completely before putting it back in the case. These should be readily available in stores so we can get away from using disposable Q-tips. Environmentally friendly reusable & washable Q-tips Portable Travel Bottles Set,Leak Proof Squeezable Silicon Tubes Travel Size Toiletries Containers,TSA Approved Refillable Travel Accessories for Shampoo Liquids (1.3Oz,4 Pack) ZAYOR {'Brand': 'ZAYOR', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Capacity': '1.3 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.38 x 3.54 inches; 4.02 Ounces', 'UPC': '729993071100'} This is a set of 4 small silicone travel bottles. They are soft and flexible. I am using them for hand sanitizer but you could use it for anything (like shampoo, body wash, hand soap, etc). I wished there was an additional silicone anti-leak flap where the product comes out (like on certain ketchup or honey bottles) so the more liquidy contents doesn't flow right out when you open the cap. I usually turn the bottle cap side up for a few seconds so the contents are away from the cap before I open and then I turn it upside down to squeeze. Included are small carabiner clips which will allow you to hook the bottle onto your keys, purse, stroller, belt loop, etc. Small silicone travel bottles [SUAVISS] K-Beauty, Spot SOS Therapy - Aimed Shot at the Acne and Skin Troubles. For all skin types. Brings you a Quick Solution. SUAVISS {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.1 x 1.7 x 5.9 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} The syringe packaging is cute but that's also a downfall. I thought I had a defective one since nothing was coming out. The plunger on the syringe doesn't press down all the way as one would expect, it goes down less than using a click pen. There's no way to open the thing up to get the gel out either. I almost gave up but I kept clicking and finally the gel was coming out. I applied it to a pimple 3 nights in a row but unfortunately nothing happened. I'm not sure if I didn't have the right type of pimple since it never came to a head and it's more cystic. I'll try again on a different type of pimple. The gel is best used at bedtime because it leaves a slightly sticky feeling on the pimple (instructions say to apply it directly to the pimple and not to spread it). Each night that I used it, I had to continuously press the plunger only for a tiny amount of gel to come out. Who knows how much product is actually in the tube. Cute packaging but not the easiest to get the gel out LXIANGN Colorful Dappen Dish Glass Crown Candle Holder Mini Nail Art Dappen Dish 2 In 1 Crystal Dipping Bowls for Nails (Colorful) LXIANGN {'Product Dimensions': '3.03 x 1.97 x 2.24 inches; 5.33 Ounces'} This is a cute iridescent colored glass crown shaped dish. I'm currently using this as a jewelry ring holder. I wish there was a cover, I think that would've been cute. This is versitile since you could use this for anything. It can also just be for display and it looks lovely the way it is. The size is good for the purpose I'm using it for. Iridescent colored crown shaped dish for multi purpose use Yinmei Baibian Chignon Hair Bun Scrunchie Hair Pieces Synthetic Clip in Drawstring Ponytail Hair Extensions for Women(Black) Yinmei Baibian {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'Yinmei Baibian', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 1.18 inches; 1.06 Ounces', 'UPC': '738633427658'} I thought the bun had a deeper pocket to go over your natural bun underneath (especially since I have long hair to begin with). The drawstring doesn't stay tight where it is. I can move the toggle without pressing down on it so the elastic can loosen. There are 2 combs in the bun to help secure it to your head. It's not that bad overall, I like the style of the bun but some hairs came undone from the bun. I also found that it easily sheds. The color did match my hair which was good. It is also lightweight. It came with some hair pins and hair elastics. Not too bad of a bun, takes some time to get it to look right Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller,Jade Roller Set Facial Beauty Tools,Face Roller Skin Massager for Face Cuckoo ['Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller& Jade Roller', 'Why choose Cuckoo?', 'Cuckoo has one pc of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller and one pc of Jade roller. The oil-absorbing volcanic face roller can help you absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times. The jade roller can improve skin circulation, soothes your skin, reducing puffiness, wrinkling and fine lines to smooth your skin.', 'Advantage Of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller', 'Prefect Oil Absorption Effect', 'Like oil-absorbing paper, but better.\xa0Roll through your face with volcanic stone balls to instantly absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times.', 'Reusable Use', 'Unlike blotting papers for oily skin that are used once and thrown out, this oil-absorbing roller is easy to clean make it reusable.', 'Special Design', 'Built-in special ball design, rolling is silkier and easier, gently or wherever the skin is shiny, rolling the face rollers.\xa0The oil on the face will disappear.', 'Easy To Carry', 'You don’t have to go rooting around your purse for blotting papers anymore.', 'Advantage Of Jade Roller', 'Natural Rose Quartz Jade', 'Natural approach to caring the skin, no dyes, sulfates, parabens or other chemicals. It is made of 100% natural Brazilian rose quartz jade stone.', 'No Crack& Scratch', "Use superb sanding technology to polish the surface of the jade many times. It is super fine and smooth so that don't scratch your skin.", 'Lifts and tighten skin& Improve the blood circulation& Smooth and reduce wrinkles& Reduces dark circles and puffiness'] {'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.18 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Face Roller-1', 'Manufacturer': 'Cuckoo'} I didn't know a product like this existed. I do have very oily skin so I'm willing to try anything. This stone does absorb oil instantly. I can see the change on my face and in the stone (the stone darkens in color). I like the design of this roller, it's compact and rolls pretty smoothly for the most part. I did wash the stone and it absorbs water quickly yet the stone didn't feel wet. I did leave it to dry overnight before replacing it back into the holder. I appreciate having an extra stone so when one is washed and waiting to dry, I have another one I can pop into the holder and use right away. This came packaged in a satin drawstring pouch. This is an interesting concept, will definitely get some stares if I just whipped this out at my desk at work and rubbed it all over my oily spots. Reusable instant facial oil absorber Reusable Qtips 2x - Cotton Swabs for Ears Wax Removal and Pointed Q tips for Makeup Removal in Green LastSwab® LastSwab {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.33 x 0.47 x 1.77 inches; 0.53 Ounces'} I like idea of using less single use items. These reusable Q-tips have different ends for different tasks. The tips feel secure on the stick. I tried pulling them off and I couldn't so that's a good safety feature. Due to the material, I can't use these with acetone nail polish remover and that's what I like to use Q-tips for. Also these are not absorbent so that's another downfall. Unfortunately I won't be relying solely on these LastSwab. Disposable Q-tips are still more versatile but at least I can decrease the usage of them in combination with the LastSwab. I wished these swabs came in a carrying case. The product description mentioned a plastic case. I did see ones with a case but that's a different product. I wasn't expecting to receive a case with this set anyway based on the seller's photos. Reusable but it can't do everything a disposable Q-tip can do
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor practical, eco-friendly accessories that enhance comfort and well-being. Their recent purchase emphasizes an ongoing interest in multifunctional items, although it highlights limitations in versatility compared to traditional single-use options.

- **Material Sensitivity:** The user maintains a strong preference for lightweight and breathable materials. Their feedback indicates appreciation for secure designs but also points to challenges when using certain materials with specific products.

- **Design Considerations:** Subtle, functional designs remain a key priority. The latest interaction reveals a positive reception to features that enhance usability, though the user expresses a desire for more comprehensive solutions, particularly regarding storage options.

- **Customization Interest:** The user is receptive to product adaptations that improve ease of use and comfort, emphasizing the importance of direct and practical functionality in their evaluations.

- **Fit Sensitivity:** Versatile sizing is still crucial to the user’s choices, aligning with their ongoing commitment to comfort in daily use.

- **Functional Needs:** The user seeks items that smoothly integrate into daily routines while balancing practicality with visual appeal. They appreciate products that aim to reduce waste but acknowledge the limitations compared to conventional items.

- **User Ratings:** Offering balanced feedback, the user provides constructive criticism, noting both effective design features and areas for improvement, showcasing a thoughtful approach to product evaluation.

This profile reflects the user's commitment to comfort, sustainability, and the quest for functional practicality in their lifestyle products.
